title: MySQL Upgrade
description: Completed a focused course on MySQL, mastering database management and querying using SQL. Gained expertise in designing, updating, and maintaining relational databases, with hands-on experience in optimizing data storage and retrieval for web applications.

title: React JS for Beginners
description: Completed an introductory course on React JS, mastering the fundamentals of building dynamic and interactive user interfaces. Gained proficiency in creating reusable components, managing state, and handling events, with hands-on experience in developing modern web applications.

title: HTML and HTML5 Hindi
description: Completed a comprehensive course on HTML and HTML5, mastering the fundamentals of web development. Gained expertise in creating structured, semantic web content, utilizing HTML5 features for multimedia, forms, and responsive design, with hands-on experience in building modern, accessible websites.
